A journey from Apache CXF 2.2 to 3.2https://htr3n.github.io/2018/06/apache-cxf-2-to-3/Fri, 15 Jun 2018 00:00:00 +0000https://htr3n.github.io/2018/06/apache-cxf-2-to-3/I have used Apache CXF 2.2 to develop Web services for some R&D projects that I took part in. At that time, it was a choice between Apache Axis/Axis2 and CXF (formerly Codehaus XFire project).
